description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国人民解放军少将，中国共产党党员。曾任海南省军区政治委员、中共海南省委常委，是第十一届全国人民代表大会解放军代表。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, a major general in the People's Liberation Army, and a member of the Communist Party of China. He served as the political commissar of the Hainan Military District, a member of the Standing Committee of the Hainan Provincial Committee of the CCP, and was a delegate of the PLA to the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国湖南省的一个县，是刘鼎新的出生地。
description.en: A county in Hunan Province, China, and the birthplace of Liu Dingxin.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要武装力量。
description.en: The principal military force of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国广东省的综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Guangdong Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在中国海南省设立的军区。
description.en: A military district of the People's Liberation Army established in Hainan Province, China.

en: Hainan Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在海南省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Hainan Province.

nodes.id: 第十一届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十一届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第六届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The sixth session of the highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

en: Major General of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的一种军衔等级。
description.en: A military rank in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 刘鼎新出生于攸县鸾山镇江冲村。
description.en: Liu Dingxin was born in Jiangchong Village, Luanshan Town, You County.

description.zh-cn: 刘鼎新于1972年加入中国人民解放军。
description.en: Liu Dingxin joined the People's Liberation Army in 1972.

description.zh-cn: 刘鼎新毕业于中山大学行政管理专业。
description.en: Liu Dingxin graduated from Sun Yat-sen University with a degree in Public Administration.

description.zh-cn: 刘鼎新曾担任海南军区政治部主任，直至2007年8月。
description.en: Liu Dingxin served as the Director of the Political Department of the Hainan Military District until August 2007.

description.zh-cn: 2007年8月，刘鼎新任海南省军区政治委员。
description.en: In August 2007, Liu Dingxin was appointed as the Political Commissar of the Hainan Military District.

description.zh-cn: 2008年6月，刘鼎新任中共海南省委常委。
description.en: In June 2008, Liu Dingxin became a member of the Standing Committee of the Hainan Provincial Committee of the CCP.

relationships.target: 第十一届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2008年起，刘鼎新担任第十一届全国人民代表大会解放军代表，任期5年。
description.en: Starting in 2008, Liu Dingxin served as a PLA delegate to the 11th National People's Congress for a five-year term.

description.zh-cn: 刘鼎新是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Liu Dingxin is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 刘鼎新拥有中国人民解放军少将军衔。
description.en: Liu Dingxin holds the rank of Major General in the People's Liberation Army.
